name: docker-py-go-node
description: Dockerizing simple Python, Go and Node.js applications

scripts.python: cd Python && docker build -t docker-python . && docker run -dp 8080:8080 docker-python
scripts.node: cd JavaScript && docker build -t docker-node . && docker run -dp 8080:8080 docker-node
scripts.go: cd Go && docker build -t docker-go . && docker run -dp 8080:8080 docker-go

author: Nikolai Chub <nikolaichub.me@gmail.com>
